values.value: BASED ON THE INFORMATION PROVIDED,THIS SERVICE IS COSMETIC AND IS NOT COVERED. THEREFORE, NO BENEFITS ARE PAYABLE FOR THIS EXPENSE. IN ORDER FOR THIS SERVICE TO BE CONSIDERED FOR COVERAGE, YOU MUST SUBMIT MEDICAL RECORDS THAT DEMONSTRATE A PHYSIOLOGICAL FUNCTIONAL IMPAIRMENT, ALONG WITH AN EXPLANATION SHOWING HOW THIS SERVICE IMPROVES OR RESOLVES SUCH FUNCTIONAL IMPAIRMENT AND MEETS THE REQUIREMENTS INDICATED IN YOUR BENEFIT PLAN LANGUAGE.
